name: WASI-MD V7
description: Advanced WhatsApp Bot by ITXXWASI - Docker-based Deployment. Most settings can be configured from WhatsApp using .settings command!

MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB connection string (Get free from: mongodb.com/cloud/atlas)

SESSION_ID.description: Your WhatsApp Session ID (unique identifier for your bot)

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Bot owner's WhatsApp number with country code (e.g., 263788049675)

PREFIX.description: Command prefix (Can also be changed via .settings set prefix <value>)

BOT_NAME.description: Bot display name (Can also be changed via .settings set botName <value>)

OWNER_NAME.description: Owner display name (Can also be changed via .settings set ownerName <value>)

MODE.description: Bot mode: public or private (Can also be changed via .settings set mode <value>)

API_URL.description: WASI DEV API URL (Can also be changed via .settings set apiUrl <value>)

WASIDEV_API_KEY.description: WASI DEV API Key (Optional, can be set via .settings set wasidevApiKey <value>)

SRIHUB_API_KEY.description: SriHub API Key (Optional, can be set via .settings set sriHubApiKey <value>)

APIFY_TOKEN.description: Apify Token (Optional, can be set via .settings set apifyToken <value>)

TIME_ZONE.description: Bot timezone (Can be changed via .settings set timeZone <value>)

FONT_STYLE.description: Font style for messages (Can be changed via .settings set fontStyle <value>)

MENU_STYLE.description: Menu style: classic, modern, minimal (Can be changed via .settings set menuStyle <value>)

MENU_IMAGE_ASSET.description: Use local menu image assets (Can be changed via .settings set menuImageAsset <value>)

MENU_IMAGE_URL.description: Use custom menu image URL (Can be changed via .settings set menuImageUrl <value>)

BOT_MENU_IMAGE_URL.description: Custom menu image URL (Can be changed via .settings set menuImage <value>)

AUTO_READ.description: Auto-read messages (Can be changed via .settings set autoRead true/false)

AUTO_STATUS_SEEN.description: Auto-view statuses (Can be changed via .settings set autoStatusSeen true/false)

AUTO_STATUS_REACT.description: Auto-react to statuses (Can be changed via .settings set autoStatusReact true/false)

AUTO_STATUS_SAVE.description: Auto-save statuses (Can be changed via .settings set autoStatusSave true/false)

AUTO_STATUS_MSG.description: Send message on status view (Can be changed via .settings set autoStatusMessage true/false)

AUTO_WELCOME.description: Auto-welcome new members (Can be changed via .settings set welcomeMessage true/false)

AUTO_GOODBYE.description: Auto-goodbye leaving members (Can be changed via .settings set goodbyeMessage true/false)

WELCOME_MSG.description: Welcome message template (Can be changed via .settings set welcomeMsg <value>)

GOODBYE_MSG.description: Goodbye message template (Can be changed via .settings set goodbyeMsg <value>)
GOODBYE_MSG.value: @user LEFT THE ROOM HAVE NICE DAY! ðŸ‘‹

LEVEL_UP.description: Enable level up system (Can be changed via .settings set levelup true/false)

AUTO_TYPING.description: Show typing indicator (Can be changed via .settings set autoTyping true/false)

AUTO_RECORDING.description: Show recording indicator (Can be changed via .settings set autoRecording true/false)

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Always show online (Can be changed via .settings set alwaysOnline true/false)

YT_COOKIES.description: YouTube cookies for downloads (Can be changed via .settings set ytCookies <value>)

YT_USER_AGENT.description: User agent for YouTube (Can be changed via .settings set ytUserAgent <value>)

CLOUDINARY_CLOUD_NAME.description: Cloudinary cloud name (Can be changed via .settings set cloudinaryCloudName <value>)

CLOUDINARY_API_KEY.description: Cloudinary API key (Can be changed via .settings set cloudinaryApiKey <value>)

CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET.description: Cloudinary API secret (Can be changed via .settings set cloudinaryApiSecret <value>)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Your Heroku App Name (Required for .update command)

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku API Key (Required for .update command)
